title: New: Teen Daze – Treten
content:
It’s mid-March and I’m sitting outside on my roof in a t-shirt… who said global warming was all bad news? Judging by new track Treten, every day is summer for Jamison aka Teen Daze; languid synths, insanely catchy hooks and all round blissed inducing vibes make up a majority of the tune.

Taken from his highly anticipated new album All Of Us, Together, now available for pre-order, Teen Daze is set for a short UK tour in April with Brothertiger, tour dates after the jump. Stream Treten below.

9 April London – The Lexington

10 April Manchester, Kraak Gallery

11 April Newcastle, The Cluny 2
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
